description:
SET THE NAME OF ONE OR MORE MAPS IN A FILE.

Sets the name of one or more maps for metric, shape, label, volume, cifti scalar or cifti label files.  You must specify either -name-file, or -from-data-file, or at least one -map option.  The three option types are mutually exclusive.

file.description:
use the map names from another data file

a data file with the same number of maps

index.description: the map index to change the name of

new-name.description: the name to set for the map

items.description: specify a map to set the name of

map.description: specify a map to set the name of

data-file.description: the file to set the map names of
